answer:
Vaccines are very safe and there are no issues with your child interacting with other children after receiving the 4 month vaccines. As the virus from the rotavirus vaccine may be found in your baby's stool for at least 10 days after immunization, thorough handwashing after changing diapers is important. You can learn more about vaccine safety here.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:

## As the virus from the rotavirus vaccine may be found in your baby's stool for at least 10 days after immunization, thorough handwashing after changing diapers is important.

You can learn more about vaccine safety here.
Immunization Nurse
